---
name: Add Services & Enquiries Module
about: Add services and enquiries endpoints/UI to capture prospective enquiries
---

### Summary

Add services and enquiries endpoints/UI to capture prospective student enquiries and internal service offerings.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Models/migrations for Services and Enquiries
- Endpoint to submit enquiries and admin UI to manage them
- Ability to mark enquiry status (new/handled/closed)

### Notes

Useful for schools that accept requests or manage external services.
